edu.ccsu.interfaces.LightEnabledDevice

    Package Description
    edu.ccsu.devices  
    edu.ccsu.factory
    Package contains factory for generating different kinds of objects
    edu.ccsu.interfaces
    Package specifies interfaces for devices and sensors

    • Uses of LightEnabledDevice in edu.ccsu.devices

      Classes in edu.ccsu.devices that implement LightEnabledDevice 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LcdScreen
      Class connects to LCD RGB Backlight and allows calling classes to print messages to the screen using a variety of methods.
      class  Led
      Class allows for operations on GrovePi LEDs.
